name: T.P. Rangers
description:
This local two-player game was created for the #1 Stay Save Jam in March 2020.

You are the T.P. Rangers and deliver important supplies to people's homes in a time of crisis. Each player takes care of one side of the road.

Get points for correct deliveries. But if you ignore too many calls for help, it's game over.  Take items from your fellow player, if you must.

THE TEAM

Design

Olaf Meißner

2D Art

Programming

Sound Design
